I AM KANE PEREIRA, A FULLSTACK SOFTWARE DEVELOPER BASED IN TORONTO, CANADA.
[SEE PROJECTS!](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<#projects>)
BIO
I am a self-taught Fullstack Software Developer with 3+ years of experience building web and mobile applications, contributing to both start-ups and open-source projects. My background in Electrical Engineering, spanning 4+ industries, has honed my problem-solving skills and heightened my ability to understand and improve complex systems. These qualities have fueled my success as a developer.
I am seeking opportunities to enhance my skills further while delivering high-quality products and scalable web services. I'm passionate about Web and IoT applications and enjoy kickboxing, running, and weight-lifting in my free time.

PROJECTS
[![Fullstack & Cyber Security - Threat Tracker App](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/aspis-fsd.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:ugcPost:7297631611028656128/>)
FULLSTACK & CYBER SECURITY - THREAT TRACKER APP
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:ugcPost:7297631611028656128/>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/Threat-Tracker>)
  * JavaScript
  * HTML
  * CSS
  * PSQL
  * React.js
  * Node.js
  * Express.js
  * Postman


I built a fullstack application that ties in cybersecurity principles using React.js and Express.js. The application requests a user to log in and get authenticated using producing a JWT. Once a valid JWT is generated the user can then login and use the API to pull cyber threat data which is peristed in PSQL. App features pagination logic and password encryption for easy UI and user account security. 
[![Form Builder React.js + Laravel + PSQL](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/deep-seek.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_deepseek-javascript-fullstack-activity-7291342284359356416-5F5H/>)
CREATE A FORM BUILDER USING DEEPSEEK + REACT.JS + LARAVEL
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_deepseek-javascript-fullstack-activity-7291342284359356416-5F5H/>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/react-php-form-builder>)
  * JavaScript
  * HTML
  * CSS
  * PSQL
  * React.js
  * Postman
  * PHP
  * Laravel


I created custom from builder using React.js, Laravel and PSQL. In this project I use DeepSeek to aid in the backend development to see whether it can help me bridge the gap between FE and BE as I have never used Laravel before. Definitely check this out~! 
[![Next.js + Notion Blog](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/notion_next_integration.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_notion-vercel-webdevelopment-activity-7284384817842999297-5ZWB/>)
CREATE A BLOG WITH NOTION + NEXT.JS
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_notion-vercel-webdevelopment-activity-7284384817842999297-5ZWB/>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/scratched-place-9d3.notion.site/Integrating-Notion-with-Next-js-App-1796a94073ef80c09566c23ed1aaee5d>)
  * JavaScript
  * HTML
  * CSS
  * React.js
  * Next.js


I created a Blog for my webpage which combines the core Next.js application with Notion acting both as a Database and a Content Management System for the Blog. 
[![Led Diagram Sketcher](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/led_diagram_sketcher.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7274304293002719232/>)
LED DIAGRAM SKETCHER
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7274304293002719232/>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/led_diagram_drawer>)
  * JavaScript
  * HTML
  * CSS
  * React.js


I built an app that takes a CSV file and pulls data from it to create drawings of LED Screens with their dimensions. You can then download these drawings in PDF form. 
[![Crude HTTP Web Server Using Web Sockets](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/python_webserver.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/webserver_tcp>)
CRUDE HTTP WEB SERVER USING WEBSOCKETS
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/webserver_tcp>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/webserver_tcp>)
  * Python


I created a crude webserver leveraging Python's Socket Library. 
[![Emoji Kitchen Game](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/emoji_kitchen.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.emojikitchengame.com/>)
EMOJI KITCHEN GAME
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.emojikitchengame.com/>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/suhas-sunder/EmojiKitchenGame-Open-Source>)
  * JavaScript
  * HTML
  * CSS
  * React.js
  * Node.js
  * Jest
  * Vitest


Emoji Kitchen Game is a website where you can mix and mash emojis to create brand-new, fun combinations! 
[![Pokeroster](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/poke_roster.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_i-love-pokemon-i-also-wanted-to-build-a-activity-7166715044985077762-k0v_/>)
POKEROSTER
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_i-love-pokemon-i-also-wanted-to-build-a-activity-7166715044985077762-k0v_/>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/pokeroster>)
  * JavaScript
  * HTML
  * CSS
  * PSQL
  * React.js
  * Next.js
  * Node.js
  * Express.js


Pokeroster is a data aggregation app that lets you choose and build your roster containing your top 6 favourite Pokemon! It shows a live feed of the top 3 most selected Pokemon from all of the data entries. 
[![Internet Usage Tracker](https://www.thekaneologist.com/assets/images/internet_usage.png)](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_tldr-christmas-special-for-people-interested-activity-7144530453478191104-SY01/>)
INTERNET USAGE TRACKER
[Site](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kane-pereira-a0a72b168_tldr-christmas-special-for-people-interested-activity-7144530453478191104-SY01/>)
[Code](https://www.thekaneologist.com/<https:/github.com/S0han/Internet-Usage-Tracker>)
  * JavaScript
  * HTML
  * CSS


I built a Google Chrome Extension that tracks time spent on the internet and allows the user to see a graph containing a live-feed of their weekly time spent online!
